name: Jump Like A Pirate
description: Jump Like a Pirate - hardcore pixel-art platformer, developed by single man. Here you will jump... or die, depends on your skill. Be greedy, collect ALL that coins, evading different deadly traps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 64-bit Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 64-bit or later Processor: Dual Core 3.0+ GHz or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
